thread.title: Joshua Dobbs named SEC Offensive Player of the Week
thread.title_full: Joshua Dobbs named SEC Offensive Player of the Week

title: Joshua Dobbs named SEC Offensive Player of the Week
text:
Facebook Email Twitter Google+ LinkedIn Pinterest Joshua Dobbs named SEC Offensive Player of the Week Dobbs is 3rd player in SEC over last 20 years with 300 passing yards and 100 rushing yards in a game. Post to Facebook Joshua Dobbs named SEC Offensive Player of the Week Dobbs is 3rd player in SEC over last 20 years with 300 passing yards and 100 rushing yards in a game. Check out this story on WBIR.com: http://on.wbir.com/1RCz0jw Cancel Send A link has been sent to your friend's email address. Posted! A link has been posted to your Facebook feed. Join the Conversation To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs Joshua Dobbs named SEC Offensive Player of the Week 11:51 a.m. EDT October 12, 2015 Oct 10, 2015; Knoxville, TN, USA; Tennessee Volunteers quarterback Joshua Dobbs (11) passes against the Georgia Bulldogs during the second half at Neyland Stadium. Tennessee won 38-31. Mandatory Credit: Jim Brown-USA TODAY Sports (Photo: Jim Brown, Jim Brown-USA TODAY Sports) CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
Tennessee quarterback Joshua Dobbs is the SEC Offensive Player of the Week the league office announced on Monday. Dobbs was a major part of Tennessee's upset of No. 19 Georgia, 38-31. 
Dobbs' numbers against the Dawgs were impressive. He threw for a career-high 312 yards and three touchdowns. Dobbs also rushed for 118 yards and two touchdowns. He is the third player in the SEC over the last 20 years with 300 passing yards and 100 rushing yards in a game. The other two are Johnny Manziel and Tim Tebow. 
Dobbs became the only player in Tennessee history with a 300-yard passing game and 100-yard rushing game. This wasn't the first time Dobbs put up those numbers. He did it against South Carolina in 2014. 
THE STATS: 430 total yards (312 pssing, 118 rushing), 5 touchdowns (3 passing, 2 rushing) 3rd career 100-yard rushing game 2nd career 300-yard passing game 
Tennessee will enjoy a bye week before traveling to Alabama. Read or Share this story: http://on.wbir.com/1RCz0jw TOP VIDEOS
